Override.entitydescription.ampicillin: An aminopenicillin class antibiotic. It is effective against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcal‖end‖ and moderately effective against ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖ infections. Slightly ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.augmentin: An aminopenicillin class antibiotic with a beta-lactamase inhibitor. It is effective against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖, and moderately effective against ‖color:gui.green‖provobacter infections‖end‖. Moderately ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.vancomycin: A glycopeptide antibiotic. It is effective against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.green‖MRSA‖end‖ infections. Strongly ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.gentamicin: An aminoglycoside antibiotic. It is effective against ‖color:gui.green‖pseudomonas‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖provobacter‖end‖, and slightly effective against ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖ infections. Strongly ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.cotrim: A combination antibiotic. It is effective against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖, and moderately effective against ‖color:gui.green‖MRSA‖end‖ infections. Moderately ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.imipenem: A combination carbapenem antibiotic. It is moderately effective against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖staphylcoccal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖pseudomonas‖end‖, and slightly effective against ‖color:gui.green‖provobacter‖end‖ infections. Moderately ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖ to the kidneys. On failure, it is more ‖color:gui.red‖toxic‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.strepvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against ‖color:gui.green‖streptococcus‖end‖ infections.
Override.entitydescription.staphvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against ‖color:gui.green‖staphylococcal‖end‖ infections.
Override.entitydescription.pseudovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against ‖color:gui.green‖pseudomonas‖end‖ infections.
Override.entitydescription.provovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against ‖color:gui.green‖provobacter‖end‖ infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.afstrepvac: The immune system is ready to fight against streptococcal infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.afstaphvac: The immune system is ready to fight against staphylococcal infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.afpseudovac: The immune system is ready to fight against pseudomonas infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.afprovovac: The immune system is ready to fight against provobacter infections.
Override.entitydescription.weaponstrep: A syringe filled with a strain of ‖color:gui.red‖streptococcus‖end‖, awaiting a host. Or, it can be returned to a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖ in the Medical Fabricator.
Override.entitydescription.weaponstaph: A syringe filled with a strain of ‖color:gui.red‖staphylococcus‖end‖, awaiting a host. Or, it can be returned to a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖ in the Medical Fabricator.
Override.entitydescription.weaponmrsa: A syringe filled with a strain of ‖color:gui.red‖MRSA‖end‖, awaiting a host. Or, it can be returned to a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖ in the Medical Fabricator.
Override.entitydescription.weaponpseudo: A syringe filled with a strain of ‖color:gui.red‖pseudomonas‖end‖, awaiting a host. Or, it can be returned to a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖ in the Medical Fabricator.
Override.entitydescription.weaponprovo: A syringe filled with a strain of ‖color:gui.red‖provobacter‖end‖, awaiting a host. Or, it can be returned to a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖ in the Medical Fabricator.
Override.afflictiondescription.pusyellow: Yellowish-white pus, oozing from a wound. A clear sign of infection, and may be collected using a culture sampler. This type of pus is not caused by pseudomonas infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.pusgreen: Greenish, foul-smelling pus, oozing from a wound. A clear sign of infection, and may be collected using a culture sampler. This type of pus is always caused by pseudomonas infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.abscess: Pus accumulation under the skin. There is no wound here, but it is a clear sign of infection, and may be collected using a culture sampler.
Override.afflictiondescription.necfasc: The skin is dying and deeply discolored. Caused by an infection while immunocompromised, increasing chance for sepsis. The infection must be attended to, and the necrotized tissue must be removed thoroughly with a scalpel after retracting the skin, or the limb can be amputated.
Override.afflictiondescription.cellulitis: Red and painful skin. Caused by an infection, and will be resolved when the infection is treated.
Override.entitydescription.cultureanalyzer: Collects bacterial samples into a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture tube‖end‖. If there is ‖color:gui.red‖pus‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.red‖abscess‖end‖, it will be collected first. If the skin is ‖color:gui.blue‖retracted‖end‖, it will collect a sample from tissue. Otherwise, it will take a blood sample, which may not be accurate if the infection has yet to enter the bloodstream.
Override.entitydescription.culturetube: A tube of rich growth medium that bacterial colonies will grow in. Used by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture sampler‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.incubatorcrate: A portable method of growing bacteria, containing slots for ‖color:gui.blue‖culture samples‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.streptubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.streptube: A culture tube with a streptococcus strain.
Override.entitydescription.staphtubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.staphtube: A culture tube with a staphyloccocus strain.
Override.entitydescription.mrsatubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.mrsatube: A culture tube with a MRSA sample.
Override.entitydescription.pseudotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.pseudotube: A culture tube with a pseudomonas sample.
Override.entitydescription.provotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.provotube: A culture tube with a provobacter sample.
Override.entitydescription.emptytubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample. After the culture is grown naturally or in an ‖color:gui.blue‖incubator‖end‖, it can be identified by a ‖color:gui.blue‖culture analyzer‖end‖.
Override.entitydescription.cultureanalyzingtermin: A machine that examines the biochemical signature of bacterial colonies to identify pathogens.
Override.cultureanalyzer.info: Insert a full-grown culture sample to analyze the type.
Override.entitydescription.incubatorterminal: A machine capable of growing cultures by maintaining the optimal conditions for bacterial growth.
Override.entitydescription.dextromethorphan: An antitussive solution used to relieve a cough.
Override.entitydescription.remdesivir: A broad-spectrum antiviral drug, commonly used to treat cases of Europan cough.
